A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
All I can say about the last Jedi is unnecessary. 
Mark Hamill did wonderfully with what he was given. 
Carrie Fisher did as well\, though she was given even less than Hamill. 
Adam Driver's performance improved from The Force Awakens\, but was still not what he is capable of. 
Daisy Ridley was the same. Together they had the chemistry of the Twilight saga\, which is forced and stale. 
So many scenes were unnecessary. While there were occasional bits of humor\, it was mostly dry otherwise. 
It doesn't capture the feeling nor the emotion of the original six films.
